title: 王毅就阿富汗強降雪及降雨災害向阿富汗外長致慰問電
news_content:
中共中央政治局委員、外交部長王毅，就阿富汗強降雪及降雨災害，向阿富汗外長穆塔基致慰問電。

王毅表示，驚悉阿富汗中部和北部部分地區發生強降雪及降雨災害，造成重大人員傷亡，他對遇難者表示沉痛哀悼，向遇難者家屬和傷者致以誠摯慰問，祝願傷者早日康復。

title: 恒生投資：香港存儲配套成熟　趁機推實金ETF新產品
news_content:
金價升穿每盎司5500美元，再創歷史新高。恒生投資發行本港首隻支持在銀行兌換實物黃金的ETF，首日在港交所上市，現價市值1.2億港元。

恒生投資董事兼行政總裁李佩珊，接受本台《財經新思維》節目訪問時表示，金價造好吸引投資者配置黃金相關投資工具，推出這款創新產品，讓投資者贖回時可選擇收錢或收取實金，多了一份擁有實金的存在感，恒生設定的贖回額度是25萬個上市單位，大約等於3條約1公斤千足黃金，每條市值逾100萬港元。

李佩珊指出，現時香港存儲配套成熟，所以恒生趁這個時機推出實金ETF新產品，有助香港成為國際黃金中心。另外，恒生投資計劃今季發行該ETF的代幣化非上市類別基金單位，透過電子平台銷售，助力香港發展鏈上投資，進一步加快本地資產交易平台及代幣化交易發展。

title: 海關機場檢獲大麻花及冰毒等市值約420萬元　案件明日提堂
news_content:
海關在機場偵破一宗販毒案，檢獲約一批大麻花、冰毒等，市值約420萬元，案件明日在西九龍裁判法院提堂。

一名42歲男子昨日從馬來西亞吉隆坡經新加坡抵港，海關人員清關時在他的寄艙行李發現約4公斤偽裝成食品的大麻花，於是將他拘捕，並在他身上再發現約2克冰毒及數粒硝甲西泮。

海關跟進調查後，昨日再於機場拘捕一名33歲涉案女子及一名34歲涉案男子，並在這名女子的行李內，檢獲約17公斤大麻花。

title: 'Severely decomposed' whale carcass found in Sai Kung
news_content:
A severely decomposed whale carcass believed to have died for some time has been found on the shores of Sai Kung.

The Agriculture, Fisheries and Conservation Department on Thursday said it had received a report in the morning about the discovery of a suspected whale carcass in Ham Tin Wan. 

It said a preliminary assessment found that the carcass measured about 11 metres in length, but noted that it would be impossible to conduct a necropsy to determine the animal's cause of death because of its "severe decomposition". 

Authorities added staff members were working to dispose of the carcass and clean up the area, which was expected to be completed on Friday. 

"The deceased whale was not a local species. It is preliminarily believed to be a baleen whale," the department said. 

"Based on the degree of decomposition of the carcass, it is estimated to have been dead for some time. It is believed that the carcass drifted into the waters of Ham Tin Wan from the open seas."

Baleen whales typically forage in the cold, high-latitude waters around the Arctic and Antarctic during the summer, while migrating to warmer, low-latitude or tropical waters for breeding and nurturing their young in the winter.

title: 西貢鹹田灣水域發現鯨魚屍體　漁護署相信為鬚鯨已死亡一段時間
news_content:
西貢鹹田灣水域今早發現一具疑似鯨魚屍體，漁護署聯同海洋公園和海洋公園保育基金人員到場調查，經初步檢視，相信死亡鯨魚屬於鬚鯨，並非本地物種，根據屍體的腐爛程度，估計已死亡一段時間，相信是從外海隨水飄流至有關水域。

漁護署表示，鯨魚屍體全長約11米，因嚴重腐爛，無法進一步解剖以確定死因，工作人員正盡快進行屍體棄置及現場清理工作，預計明日完成，期間市民應避免前往現場，以免妨礙屍體棄置工作並造成危險。
 
署方表示，根據紀錄，鬚鯨的分布幾乎遍及全球海洋，不同品種的主要生活水域各有不同。鬚鯨通常在夏季前往高緯度寒冷海域，例如北極或南極周邊覓食；冬季則會遷徙到較溫暖的低緯度或熱帶海域，進行繁殖與育幼活動。
 
漁護署呼籲市民，如發現鯨魚出沒或鯨豚擱淺，應立即致電1823或透過1823手機應用程式通報，同時市民必須與鯨豚保持距離，注意個人安全，以免發生危險。

title: Bus passenger trapped due to foil-stuffed buckle
news_content:
A passenger was stuck on a Citybus after failing to unfasten the seatbelt to alight, with bus operator saying a piece of aluminium foil found inside the buckle was to blame.

The man, 40, was trying to get off a 795X Citybus bound for So Uk near Sham Shui Po Sports Ground on Thursday morning.

He was unable to unbuckle his seatbelt, prompting 16 firefighters and four paramedics to be dispatched. 

While waiting to be freed, the man reportedly felt unwell and was later sent to Caritas Medical Centre. 

Citybus said the driver stopped the bus at Cheung Wah Street and reported the incident after being notified of a passenger failing to unbuckle.

The firm said an inspection found a piece of aluminium foil stuffed inside the buckle, suspecting someone was deliberately trying to damage the seatbelt. 

The Transport Department said it's highly concerned about the incident and told Citybus to submit a report and take follow-up action.

The department urged franchised bus operators to conduct routine checks to ensure all seatbelts work properly.

It added the government has been closely monitoring the implementation of the mandatory seatbelt law for buses and minibuses that took effect on Sunday, and vowed to listen to the views of passengers on the matter.

title: 李強晤施紀賢　稱中英要推動雙邊貿易擴容提質
news_content:
國務院總理李強在北京同來華訪問的英國首相施紀賢舉行會談。李強表示，中方願同英方繼續相向而行，尊重彼此核心利益和重大關切，加強戰略溝通，打牢互信基礎，深化各領域合作，推動雙邊關係行穩致遠。

李強指出，中方願同英方完善政府間對話合作機制，更加經常性地開展各層級各領域交往。雙方要更好發揮互補優勢，推動雙邊貿易擴容提質，加強金融監管、金融市場互聯互通等方面交流對接，深化人工智能等新興產業合作，相互賦能、更好發展。

施紀賢表示，英方願同中方加強高層及各領域交往對話，支持開放自由貿易，深化貿易、金融、投資、製造業、服務業、文化等領域交流合作，歡迎中國企業赴英開展投資合作。

title: 內地發文鼓勵網絡視聽服務及體育賽事等服務消費發展
news_content:
國務院辦公廳日前印發文件，鼓勵網絡視聽服務、入境消費、演出服務和體育賽事等服務消費發展。

當局指，研究支持民營資本依法依規開展網絡視聽服務。促進超高清視頻、微短劇等網絡視聽服務市場有序競爭、創新發展。

另外，亦會研究穩妥擴大單方面免簽、過境免簽、區域性免簽政策適用範圍，鼓勵引進一批國外優秀體育賽事，促進郵輪、游艇等消費。

至於在強化財政金融支持方面，當局提出，統籌利用現有資金渠道，支持發展服務消費、培育服務消費新增長點。引導金融機構加大對服務消費新增長點領域經營主體的信貸投放力度，合理確定貸款利率水平。支持符合條件的消費基礎設施項目，發行基礎設施領域不動產投資信託基金(REITs)，加大消費信貸支持力度。

title: 一個吞拿魚樣本驗出孔雀石綠　食安中心追查來源和分銷情況
news_content:

中心透過恆常食物監測計劃，從進口層面檢取吞拿魚樣本作檢測。結果顯示樣本含孔雀石綠，含量為10億分之1.4。

​中心會繼續跟進事件和採取適當行動。調查仍然繼續。

title: 運輸署非常關注巴士安全帶疑被干擾導致失靈　要求提交報告
news_content:
城巴一名男乘客準備下車時無法解開安全帶，一度被困。消防出動20名消防及救護員到場，協助事主脫困。城巴說，涉事安全帶鎖扣內部被一張錫紙阻礙正常運作，懷疑有人蓄意破壞安全帶。運輸署表示，接獲巴士營辦商報告一宗乘客座位安全帶懷疑被干擾導致失靈的個案，署方非常關注事件，已要求巴士營辦商就個案提交報告，嚴肅跟進。

運輸署又說，已清晰要求專營巴士營辦商，除持續推行乘客需佩戴安全帶的宣傳外，亦必須做好日常安全帶的檢查、清潔和維護工作，確保所有安全帶安裝妥當及運作正常。

署方強調，政府一直密切留意佩戴安全帶新規定的實施情況，仔細聆聽乘客在不同情況佩戴安全帶的意見。

title: 俄方稱向烏方移交1000具烏軍陣亡士兵遺體
news_content:

俄羅斯和烏克蘭高級談判代表去年5月至7月，在伊斯坦布爾舉行三輪會談，並未就兩國領導人會晤、停火等核心議題取得突破，雙方在人道主義議題上取得進展，同意繼續交換被扣押人員以及陣亡士兵遺體。

title: 趙樂際晤施紀賢　稱願同英方努力恢復兩國立法機構正常交往
news_content:
全國人大常委會委員長趙樂際上午在北京會見英國首相施紀賢。

趙樂際表示，在變亂交織的國際形勢下，發展好中英關係具有重要時代價值和全球意義。中方願同英方一道，秉持戰略伙伴定位，把握積極務實、穩定互惠的正確方向，排除干擾，妥處分歧，確保中英關係走得穩、走得實、走得遠。中方願同英方相向而行，共同努力恢復兩國立法機構正常交往，歡迎英國議員來華參訪，感知真實、立體、全面的中國。

title: 當局稱陽江核電站昨日0級偏差對安全和環境沒影響
news_content:
廣東省核應急委員會辦公室向本港保安局通報，陽江核電站3號機組昨日處於按計劃大修停運狀態期間，工作人員在保護信號未取消的情況下，執行蒸汽發生器排水作業，觸發輔助給水泵自動啓動信號，有關水泵已恢復正常，工作人員繼續按計劃檢修機組。

title: 衞生署市民勿購買網上非法出售含受管制藥物成分減肥產品
news_content:
衞生署表示，有人在網上非法出售含有受管制藥物成分的減肥產品，署方正調查事件，呼籲市民切勿購買，已購買的市民應立即停止服用。

有關產品的紙盒包裝上，印有英文「KRN+PM」及「KOREAN PREMIUM」，內有30個密封包裝袋，每包有7顆藥丸和膠囊；產品包裝上有以韓文顯示有關產品可能源自韓國。

衞生署指出，化驗結果顯示，壓印「Y|H」字樣的橙色圓形藥丸，含有「氫氯噻嗪」；印有「TG」和「FLM」字樣的綠黃色膠囊含有「氟西汀」，兩者均屬《藥劑業及毒藥條例》下的第1部毒藥。有關產品懷疑是未經註冊的藥劑製品，署方會繼續調查和採取適當跟進。

衞生署說，「氫氯噻嗪」用以治療高血壓，其副作用包括低血壓和電解質不平衡。「氟西汀」用以治療抑鬱症，可能引起幻覺及失眠。

news_content:
城巴一名男乘客準備下車時無法解開安全帶，一度被困。城巴檢查後發現，涉事安全帶鎖扣內部被一張錫紙阻礙正常運作，懷疑有人蓄意破壞安全帶，公司高度關注事件，將報警處理。

警方今早近11時半接報，一名40歲男子乘坐巴士至長沙灣深水埗運動場外時打算下車，但未能解開安全帶，消防出動16名消防員及4名救護員到場，協助事主脫困。期間男子因現場空氣不流通感到不適，由救護車送往明愛醫院治理。

城巴回覆查詢表示，今早約10時，一輛795X號線往蘇屋方向的巴士，車長接獲乘客報告，指其中一條安全帶未能解開。車長隨即按指引，安排巴士停靠最接近的長沙灣昌華街巴士站跟進。車長向車務控制中心報告事件後，涉事乘客在消防員協助下離開座位。

發言人說，為配合安全帶新規定實施，城巴正進行安全帶專項檢查，目標在短期內完成對全車隊超過1700輛巴士每條安全帶的深度檢查。公司亦已將安全帶性能的各項測試項目納入巴士每月例行檢查，以監測安全帶使用率提升後的狀況。

title: 15歲女童染甲型流感一度情況嚴重　本月第四宗兒童流感嚴重個案
北都未來5年產出900公頃熟地　甯漢豪：進入全面起動關鍵期
news_content:
發展局局長甯漢豪表示，北部都會區發展現已進入全面起動的關鍵時期，預計未來幾年，產出的房屋和經濟樓面面積會節節上升。

甯漢豪在立法會發展事務委員會政策簡報會上說，北都未來5年將產出約900公頃「熟地」，有約7萬個房屋單位落成入伙，並提供約100萬平方米的經濟樓面面積；若以未來10年計算，產出的發展土地則會倍增至1800公頃，房屋單位數目約24萬個及超過1000萬平方米的經濟樓面面積。

實政圓桌議員莊豪鋒關注發展北都的開支，甯漢豪回應，北都發展橫跨多年，很多細節包括設施發展都需要動態調節，開支總額較難一概而論，不希望粗疏公布一個總數，以免引起很多誤會。但她說當局已推出很多措施，包括片區開發、原址換地等，都是想借助市場力量，意味有部分開支不是由政府出資。

工程界議員卜國明關注北都未來5年收地多達680公頃，相當於40個維園，如何確保準時收回土地，又提議招商引資時為進駐企業提供稅務優惠。甯漢豪表示徵地工作已展開，過去一段時間尚算順利，相信是因為補償政策具透明度，近年較少遇到對抗情況，但強調不能掉以輕心，會繼續做好部署及溝通工作。她又說，本港的稅務框架已相當吸引，如要個別再提供稅務優惠，政府已有相應機制，會以個案的形式考慮。

選委界議員陳曼琪關注北都的公私營房屋比例，甯漢豪表示，大型新發展區一般以7比3作為藍本，但會因應地區的主題再作調較。她舉例牛潭尾新發展區是北都大學城的重要組成部分，房屋單位就應以私樓為主。

title: 衞生防護中心：本地急性腸胃炎活躍程度持續上升　籲市民提高警覺
news_content:
衞生防護中心提醒，本地急性腸胃炎的活躍程度近期持續上升，由本月4日至28日，共錄得約24宗院舍和學校的急性腸胃炎爆發個案，合共涉及約173人。

中心預計本港急性腸胃炎的活躍程度短期內會持續上升，呼籲市民提高警覺，注意衛生。中心亦會發信給醫生、院舍、學校、幼稚園及幼兒中心，提醒須按照「預防傳染病指引」執行預防和控制措施，一旦出現急性腸胃炎爆發個案，應盡快通報中心以作即時跟進。

中心總監徐樂堅表示，監測數據顯示，院舍和學校的急性腸胃炎爆發個案在過去數星期持續上升。本月首兩周分別錄得3宗及7宗，涉及18人和46人。上周再錄11宗，涉及人數增至86人。而本周首4天亦錄得3宗，涉及23人。

中心說，急性腸胃炎可由多種病毒引致，最常見的是諾如病毒。該病毒具高度傳染性，受影響人士即使接觸少量諾如病毒，亦有機會受感染。病毒可透過進食受污染的食物、接觸受感染人士的嘔吐物或排泄物，及接觸受污染的物件等不同途徑傳播。

徐樂堅提醒，酒精不能有效殺死諾如病毒等經常引起急性腸胃炎的病毒，酒精搓手液不能代替使用梘液和清水潔手。市民亦應避免進食未經徹底煮熟的食物，若嘔吐或腹瀉，切勿上班或上學，應立即求醫。

title: HK to overcome hurdles, forge own path in 2026: CE
news_content:
Hong Kong has to overcome obstacles and forge its own path in 2026, Chief Executive John Lee said on Thursday, following a year filled with events of far-reaching significance to the city's development. 

At a function announcing the top 10 events related to the government, Lee said the SAR experienced the success of the Legislative Council elections and impartial court rulings on national security cases. 

He also said the territory experienced hard times together, citing the deadly Wang Fuk Court blaze. 

Looking ahead, the chief executive said Hong Kong should turn grief into growth while vowing to continue working to align with the nation's development.

"The government will consolidate and improve the executive-led governance model, unite all patriotic forces, continue to actively integrate and serve the country's development, and proactively align with national strategies such as the 15th Five-Year Plan," Lee said. 

"At the same time, the government will carry out systemic reforms, break down the barriers of vested interests with determination, and make Hong Kong, our home, a better place."

Meanwhile, a poll that determined the city's most significant events of 2025 was co-organised by 30 media outlets, including RTHK. 

The poll found that the three most significant events last year were the Legco elections, the Tai Po fire and the National Games.

title: 議員倡成立「樓宇維修局」 　甯漢豪：協助屋宇署做好角色更直接
news_content:
在立法會發展事務委員會政策簡報會，建築、測量、都市規劃及園境界議員劉文君建議成立一個新的「樓宇維修局」。發展局局長甯漢豪表示，希望以最快方法做好樓宇維修招標制度和工程監管，對於成立新機構負責規管、監管的建議，她認為，協助屋宇署做好有關角色，行這條路更直接。

甯漢豪表示，為了協助缺乏知識的業主招標和監察，當局提出加強版「招標妥」，用好市建局作為法定機構平台，局方亦會增加人力資源，加快有關工作。

選委會界議員樓家強關注，加強版「招標妥」在審查顧問和承建商時會否加入金管局和私隱專員公署，以監察異常錢銀來往和個人資料洩露的可疑行為，並利用人工智能分析資料，協助業主預測合理工程預算。甯漢豪表示，日後肯定不單止警方和廉政公署提供資料，還會有其他單位。至於就不同標書評標時，個別部門正利用人工智能分析，將來希望會加強。

港島東吳秋北提出，當局會否放寬樓宇更新大行動資助額，甯漢豪表示，目前資助額已經涵蓋8成要進行樓宇維修的樓宇，涵蓋面相當闊，但計劃本身的總額即將派完，反而會從這方面思考如何處理。

九龍西鄭泳舜關注，當局如何確保在修訂建築物條例和推出加強版招標妥後，不會加重相關流程。甯漢豪表示，樓宇維修要按時完成需要組合拳，過去很多工程出現拖拖拉拉，有時因為業主之間爭論或者認真度的問題，相信當局下半年推出的措施，會讓物業管理和法團運作改善，加強版「招標妥」亦有助找到好的顧問和承建商。

title: 按揭中介預期H按息率仍將處於封頂水平一段時間
news_content:
美國聯儲局維持利率不變，本港3家發鈔銀行亦維持港元最優惠利率不變。

中原按揭董事總經理王美鳳表示，本港最優惠利率已返回加息前水平，預料今年最優惠利率維持現水平不變。今年美息仍有下調空間，將有利港元拆息進一步回落。

她說，雖然以H按為主流的實際按息仍將處於封頂息水平3.25厘一段時間，但年內拆息回落亦有利銀行紓緩資金成本，銀行按揭取態積極，同時可能增加按揭優惠。

經絡按揭轉介首席副總裁曹德明預計，聯儲局上半年仍有至少一次減息機會，但現時本港銀行體系總結餘仍維持約538億港元，拆息回落空間相對有限，預計拆息上半年大致徘徊於2厘至3厘區間，以現時一般新造H按計劃H+1.3厘計，除非有大量資金流入本港銀行體系，推使拆息跌穿1.95厘以下，H按實際按息及每月供樓開支才可進一步下降。

星之谷按揭轉介行政總裁莊錦輝亦認為，即使拆息短期波動，年內按息亦不會長期低於封頂息率，業主不宜期望供樓負擔會大為減輕。

title: Privacy commissioner warns of recruitment scams
news_content:
The Office of the Privacy Commissioner for Personal Data (PCPD) urged construction workers to stay vigilant against fraudulent recruitment ads as Chinese New Year approaches.

In the past two weeks, the PCPD received 42 complaints from workers who shared personal details with scammers posing as recruiters on social media and messaging apps, including WhatsApp, Facebook, and WeChat.

Victims reported sharing personal information such as their ID Card, Construction Workers Registration Card, Safety Training Certificate, and even bank account details with alleged recruiters who published recruitment messages on platforms.

"The publisher subsequently requested the workers to gather at designated MTR station exits at specified times. However, the publisher failed to show up and could no longer be contacted," the PCPD said.

"The construction workers were therefore concerned about their personal data being maliciously used by criminals or for other illegal purposes, so they lodged complaints with the PCPD," it added.

As fraudsters are becoming increasingly active, the PCPD reminded job seekers to verify the authenticity of employers, avoid disclosing sensitive data before confirming an offer and keep communication records during the recruitment process.

title: 合資格創科企業服務機構即日起可申請「創科加速器先導計劃」
news_content:
施政報告提出，撥款1.8億元推行「創科加速器先導計劃」，為創科企業服務機構在香港建立加速器基地提供資助。創新科技署宣布，合資格創科企業服務機構可由即日起提交申請，4月30日截止。

申請企業必須是已在香港註冊成立的公司，至少具有5年在海內外支援科技初創企業發展的經驗，並須在香港設立實體營運基地，在不遲於提交申請表格起計的12個月內開始營運和提供加速服務，須聘請最少3名全職員工在香港營運基地負責為初創企業提供增值服務，例如場地設施、研發支援、導師指導、領域專家諮詢和商業網絡等。

計劃為期三年，每家申請企業只可有一個獲批項目，獲批資助總額上限為3000萬元。政府會按1比2的配對比例提供資助，涵蓋項目成立和營運創科加速器的必要開支。創新科技署已成立評審委員會審核有關申請，評審準則包括創科企業服務機構的經驗、營運模式、資金及資源、管理及項目團隊的質素，以及對香港創科生態圈的效益。

title: 外交部︰中方繼續為緩解烏克蘭人道局勢發揮建設性作用
news_content:
在北京，外交部回應記者就烏克蘭危機的提問，發言人郭嘉昆表示，中方將繼續以自己的方式為緩解烏克蘭人道局勢發揮建設性作用。

郭嘉昆重申，中方在烏克蘭危機問題上的立場是一貫和明確，中方從不拱火澆油，也不趁機漁利，更不接受甩鍋推責。中方始終呼籲各方遵守戰場不外溢、戰事不升級、各方不拱火的局勢降溫三原則，共同為危機的政治解决積累條件。

title: 監管機構建議明年3月起　場外衍生工具結算標準化計算期間
news_content:
金管局與證監會就場外衍生工具結算規則下的標準計算期間，發表聯合諮詢文件，2月27日截止，計劃今年第3季前，將實施建議修訂所需的附屬法例，提交立法會進行先訂立後審議程序，並建議明年3月起實施。

當局指，在現行做法下，因應場外衍生工具交易須進行中央結算的規定，結算規則指明現有計算期間清單要定期更新。為提高操作效率，監管機構建議，明年3月起，一次過指定每年的標準計算期間。

當局指，建議修訂將有助衍生工具交易商，更明確識別未來的計算期間，以確保合規。

title: 李家超：特區政府會鞏固完善行政主導　積極融入服務國家發展大局
news_content:
行政長官李家超表示，新一年香港需要砥礪前行，把奮鬥融入日常工作，特區政府會鞏固完善行政主導，團結所有愛國愛港力量，推動香港繼續積極融入和服務國家發展大局，主動對接十五五規劃等國家戰略，同時推行系統性改革，決心打破利益藩籬，讓香港變得更美好。

李家超出席「2025年特區政府施政十件大事評選」頒獎禮致辭表示，過去一年，香港在邁向由治及興新征程上，穩步前行，共同見證很多對香港未來發展具有深遠意義的事件。香港堅定維護國家安全和法治精神，築牢繁榮穩定的根基，第八屆立法會選舉順利舉行是完善選舉制度後的第二次立法會選舉，行政立法進一步良性互動、開新局面。他又說，有國安才有家安，法院對危害國家安全的案件作出公正裁決，展示香港上下維護國家安全的決心、彰顯法治精神，而安全是發展的基石，法治是自由的保障。

李家超又提到，大埔宏福苑火災令人痛心，在災難面前，特區政府迅速應變，消防、警務、醫療、社會福利等人員，努力救援，全力以赴，並深刻感受到中央對香港的關愛，內地同胞對香港的情義，更體會到香港人同舟共濟、守望互助的精神。

評選活動由大公文匯集團等30間媒體聯合主辦，首三件大事的標題依次序為「立法會選舉成功舉行　優質民主開創新局」、「宏福苑發生五級大火　齊心協力救災善後」、「粵港澳攜手承辦全運會與殘特奧會　大灣區融合樹新里程碑」。

其他入選的大事包括啟德體育園啟用、推進黃金交易市場建設、簡約公屋年內入伙、黎智英危害國安裁定罪成、紀念抗戰勝利八十周年、北部都會區提速發展和國際調解院成立。

title: 衞生防護中心發布新版《社區醫療抗生素用藥建議》呼籲醫生參考
news_content:
衞生防護中心發布新版《社區醫療抗生素用藥建議》，呼籲醫生為病人處方抗生素時參考相關建議，減少不必要處方。

中心的感染控制處主任馬紹強表示，優化抗菌藥物、包括抗生素的使用是《香港抗菌素耐藥性策略及行動計劃》下控制抗菌藥物耐藥性問題的主要策略之一。中心成立的社區醫療抗生素用藥建議諮詢小組，根據最新本地流行病學和抗菌素耐藥性數據，同時參考海外臨床指引，更新針對7種社區常見感染的《用藥建議》，協助醫生更精準處方抗生素，避免出現抗生素「今日濫用　明天無用」的後果。

中心呼籲，市民若染上傷風、感冒或新冠病毒，應及時就醫，切勿在沒有處方下自行到藥房購買抗生素服用；不要向醫生要求抗生素。只有在醫生建議下，才服用抗生素，並須完成整個療程。即使症狀有所改善，也不應自行停用抗生素；接種季節性流感疫苗和新冠病毒疫苗，是預防二次感染細菌的有效方法，從而減少使用抗生素，避免出現抗菌素耐藥性。

title: 國防部：堅決查處張又俠和劉振立是黨和軍隊反腐敗鬥爭重大成果
news_content:
中央政治局委員、中央軍委副主席張又俠，中央軍委委員、中央軍委聯合參謀部參謀長劉振立，涉嫌嚴重違紀違法，被立案審查調查。國防部新聞發言人蔣斌表示，堅決查處兩人，是黨和軍隊反腐敗鬥爭取得的重大成果，是黨和軍隊有決心、有力量的重要體現，對於打贏軍隊反腐敗鬥爭攻堅戰、持久戰和總體戰具有重要意義。

蔣斌表示，人民軍隊越反腐越堅強、越純潔和越有戰鬥力，始終是黨和人民可完全信賴的英雄軍隊，堅決反對污蔑抹黑中方的反腐行動，中國軍隊始終秉持開放合作理念，將繼續與各國軍隊開展對話交流，深化軍事互信，加強務實合作，為國際和地區和平穩定貢獻中國力量。

蔣斌又說，和平統一、「一國兩制」是解決台灣問題的基本方針，實現祖國統一的最佳方式，不允許任何人把祖國分裂出去。他表示，台獨武裝毋須枉費心機，不論如何與解放軍對抗，無疑是以卵擊石，最終只會自取滅亡，最終結果也是祖國實現統一。台灣是中國一部分，解放軍堅決挫敗一切台獨分裂行徑和外來干涉圖謀，民進黨當局擔敢輕舉妄動，必遭迎頭痛擊。

title: Cleaning firm worker arrested over dead fish: sources
news_content:
Sources on Thursday said that a cleaning company's forewoman was arrested on suspicion of animal cruelty, following the deaths of more than a hundred fish in a pond in Tseung Kwan O. 

The fish were found dead on Monday in a park in King Lam Estate, after cleaners washed the pond. 

RTHK understands that cleaners moved the fish into containers with aquarium air pumps, and it's suspected that there wasn't enough oxygen for them.

Sources said the woman, 51, was arrested on Wednesday following police investigations.

title: 嗇色園料今年約2至4萬人到黃大仙祠上「頭炷香」
news_content:
嗇色園黃大仙祠在大除夕年廿九、即2月16日晚上9時起，開放給市民入祠等候，於子時上「頭炷香」，可選擇進入晚上11時或午夜12時的等候區輪候，按工作人員指示分批上香。 

嗇色園行政總裁冼碧珊表示，去年大約有2萬3千4百人次上「頭炷香」，預計今年會有約2至4萬人次，需視乎當日天氣等情況。園方早前已與警方、民安隊、食環署等舉行會議，討論人流路線安排。

黃大仙祠在正月初一至十五會繼續實施人潮管制措施及單向參神路線，預料新春期間入園人次會與蛇年相若，即接近100萬左右。祠內會額外增聘保安連同約200名義工，每日約有200至300人維持秩序。

冼碧珊又說，香港本地有上「頭炷香」文化，預計本港廟宇在農曆新年期間會香火鼎盛。她感謝政府及旅發局等支持，將緊密合作，作聯乘活動，例如年初三賽馬會將安排旅遊巴在黃大仙祠附近接載前往沙田馬場，體驗賽馬活動，祠內亦會有一系列活動吸引旅客及市民。

title: 全球人才高峰會周將於3月中旬於會展舉行
news_content:
香港人才服務辦公室公布，國際人才盛事全球人才高峰會周將於3月中旬舉行，聚焦教育、科技與人才一體化發展，促進區域人才交流，共同探索未來人才趨勢。
 
全球人才高峰會周分為三部分，包括3月18及19日在會展舉行的國際人才論壇和機遇匯人才博覽展，以及一系列為期約一周、與人力資源和人才發展相關的衞星活動。

人才辦總監陳海勁表示，香港作為亞洲第一的人才高地，期望透過全球人才高峰會周匯聚來自各地政商領袖的真知灼見，展示多元發展機遇，驅動跨地域、跨領域的人才合作，同時啓迪前瞻視野。

title: 黃光耀：現時按揭利率水平對樓市銷情影響不大
news_content:
美國聯儲局維持利率不變，會德豐地產副主席兼常務董事黃光耀說，符合市場預期，現時按揭利率約3.25厘，預料對樓市銷情影響不大，尤其豪宅買家普遍財力雄厚，未必會借貸置業。他預期，銀行存款利率持續向下，資金需找出路，股市、物業市場均見明顯流入。

黃光耀指出，一手物業市場本月錄得約2200宗成交，較去年同期約700至800宗大幅增加，同時股市升至逾27000點，創四年多新高，帶動財富效應，預計中高價及豪宅交投將明顯受惠。他透露，集團本月已錄得近300宗物業成交，套現約30億元。

他說，集團與港鐵合作發展的黃竹坑站港島南岸第6B期住宅項目，有望在下周上載樓書，會視乎市況推售，計劃全數逾150個單位以招標型式出售。他又說，項目命名以來已收到逾2000個查詢，不乏港島區的家族成員，認為市場反應理想。

title: Customs seize HK$56m in smuggled goods
news_content:
Customs officers on Thursday said they seized smuggled goods worth more than HK$56 million last week on a vessel at Black Point near Tuen Mun. 

Officers said after carrying out the appropriate analysis and risk assessment, the vessel departing from Hong Kong for Macao was selected for inspection on January 21. 

Upon examination of the boat, customs officers found a large batch of suspected smuggled goods, including suspected pharmaceutical products, cosmetic injections, tobacco products, e-cigarette cartridges, watches, mobile phones, tablets and clothing.

Syndicate Crimes Investigation Bureau Special Unit Investigator Shirley Woo said there's been a growing trend of needles used for medical or beauty treatments being smuggled.

She reminded the public not to buy these needles from unknown origins.

"The general public should really read about the ingredients of different beauty needles they want to import or export, but mostly the majority of these beauty needles are strictly restricted under our law."

Customs officers believe smugglers had been trying to avoid paying tax on the items.

Investigations are ongoing and officers said the likelihood of arrests has not been ruled out.

title: 國防部發言人稱事實早證明任何遏制圍堵中國企圖不可能得逞
news_content:
在北京，國防部新聞發言人蔣斌表示，事實早已證明，任何遏制圍堵中國的企圖都不可能得逞，相互尊重、和平共處、合作共贏才是中美正確相處之道。中方願與美方一起，推動中美關係穩定發展，同時堅定維護自身主權、安全、發展利益。

蔣斌說，中方希望美方樹立客觀理性對華認知，堅持不衝突、不對抗的底線，停止渲染所謂「中國軍事威脅」，停止煽動陣營對抗，停止在涉及中方核心利益的問題上，說一套做一套，以實際行動推動兩軍關係健康穩定發展。

title: 學者稱中英兩國領袖會面有重要意義　打破中國威脅論
news_content:
國家主席習近平在北京人民大會堂會見來華進行正式訪問的英國首相施紀賢，這是相隔8年再有英國首相訪問中國。有政治學者分析，兩國領袖會面有重要意義，打破中國威脅論，對其他歐洲國家也會有刺激作用。

港大政治與公共行政學系名譽教授盧兆興說，過去數年中國在英國眼中被視為威脅，今次相隔8年，施紀賢率領約60人的政商界代表團訪華，象徵兩國將展開合作新局面，打破中英之間過去數年的僵局，意義重大。

對於習近平向施紀賢提到，當前國際形勢變亂交織，中英兩國作為聯合國安理會常任理事國及世界主要經濟體，在維持世界和平穩定、促進經濟等需要加強合作。盧兆興分析，中國希望英國也擔當維持世界和平角色，例如在俄烏戰爭中出力；美國霸權越趨利害下，作為美國緊密盟友，英國應擔當調和角色。

盧兆興認為英國正以「行鋼線」的外交政策前進，既要平衡與美國的關係，同時靠近中國，釋出善意，採取溫和務實策略。他相信中國對英國的策略也會是緩步主義，一邊交往，一邊視乎情況調整。

title: 王毅晤英國首相國家安全事務顧問　稱中英要攜手應對挑戰
news_content:
在北京，中共中央政治局委員、中央外辦主任王毅會見英國首相國家安全事務顧問鮑威爾。

會見在昨晚舉行。王毅表示，施紀賢訪華是英國首相時隔8年對中國進行正式訪問，中英兩國同為聯合國安理會常任理事國，對世界和平與發展肩負重要責任，在當前變亂交織的國際形勢下，更要遵循聯合國憲章宗旨和原則，加強對話合作，攜手應對挑戰，共同維護以聯合國為核心的國際體系。

新華社報道，鮑威爾表示英方希望以施紀賢今次訪華為契機，同中方加強各領域、各層級對話合作，發展更加連貫、全面的戰略伙伴關係。雙方亦就烏克蘭危機等共同關心的國際和地區問題交換了意見。

title: 報告：本港有61%員工已應用人工智能
news_content:
羅兵咸永道一份職場調查報告指出，本港有61%員工已在工作中應用人工智能(AI)，高於全球平均，過去1年使用AI最多的包括資訊科技、商業策略與研發的工作。

該行去年訪問本港1061名僱員。調查顯示，雖然分別有77%及75%受訪者認為，AI分別有助提升生產力及工作品質，但只有24%受訪者認為，有助提升工作保障。

僱員對使用AI感受不一，分別有16%和22%人感到困惑和憂慮，但亦有25%和36%感到興奮和好奇。不同世代亦有不同感受，X世代反應較冷淡和平穩，千禧世代普遍更正面，Z世代則更易陷入困惑與憂慮。

另外，調查顯示，分別約20%和17%本港僱員預期今年會獲加薪或升職，有16%僱員有意未來12個月轉工，全部都按年大幅回落超過一半。此外，逾50%受訪者對自己的工作感到疲累，反映科技轉變和應用帶來的挑戰，約40%受訪者對工作感到滿意。

羅兵咸永道人才和組織諮詢服務主管合夥人程宇浩表示，科技變革削弱僱員對工作保障的安全感，估計未來或會有更多行政工作容易被AI取代，但涉及客戶服務等工種則較難被取代，又認為本港在生成式AI與代理式AI應用仍有提升空間，潛力未充分釋放。

金融業管理諮詢主管合夥人盧啟豪則指，香港職場應「由上而下」鼓勵員工更積極運用AI，將數碼技能納入績效評核，設立激勵計劃，並就工作保障和技術變革保持溝通，令員工對科技更有信心，與企業戰略目標保持一致。

title: 周一鳴：去年有約2500名大專學生受騙　損失金額逾3億元
news_content:
警務處處長周一鳴表示，近年詐騙案已經成為主流罪案，騙徒無孔不入，去年有約2500名大專學生受騙，損失金額超過3億元。

周一鳴出席一個青年防騙活動致辭表示，詐騙案對受害青少年不但構成金錢損失，亦造成心理創傷，甚至影響成長、學習和家庭關係，更曾經有受害人因而自尋短見。

他表示，青少年的防騙工作刻不容緩，警方希望透過科學化和數據化方式，設計更到位的防騙策略。他又說，警方聯同香港青年協會推出「青年防騙平台」，匯聚執法部門、社福機構、金融及支付機構等，教育及支援青少年。

title: 羅淑佩：本港去年共接待近5千萬旅客人次升12%　成績非常好
news_content:
文化體育及旅遊局局長羅淑佩表示，本港去年共接待近5000萬旅客人次，比2024年增加12%，其中内地旅客佔3800萬人次，按年上升11%，非内地旅客佔1210萬人次，按年增幅達到15%，形容成績非常好。

羅淑佩在旅遊博覽會開幕禮上致辭，提到機場三跑系統正式投入服務後，去年的航班數量與2018至2019年相比，已回復至81%，展望今年再增至86%，除了意味會有更多旅客到訪香港，市民亦可享有更多航班選擇，更容易買到機票，她希望機票價格能維持平穩。

羅淑佩亦指出，全球旅遊趨勢正快速變化，旅客要求更深層次、更有特色的體驗，本港的景點以至旅遊業界，在為市民或旅客制定行程時，也需要擁抱創新，持續提升服務質素，才能吸引到顧客不一定以自由行形式出行，而是更願意使用旅行服務代理商的行程、參加旅行團等。

農曆新年將至，羅淑佩說，本港將舉辦多項大型精彩活動，包括大年初一的新春花車匯演、初二的煙花匯演、初三的新春賽馬等，誠意歡迎各地旅客來臨，體驗香港中外文化交流、新春節慶的魅力。

title: 競委會：執法行動揪出圍標集團涉17項維修工程　合約總值7億元
news_content:
競委會就樓宇維修業界的反競爭行為，一連兩日採取執法行動，搜查27個處所，包括14間工程承辦商及顧問公司的辦公室，以及涉案人士住所。競委會說，有關公司涉嫌在全港17個屋苑及大廈的維修工程招標期間，涉嫌從事圍標等反競爭行為，初步估計相關合約總值約7億元。

競委會說，過去兩年先後採取4次執法行動，期間取得相關證據後，抽絲剝繭，再揭發另一個潛藏的圍標集團，針對該集團展開調查。

競委會的資料顯示，有關集團主腦是一間工程承辦商，成員包括多間工程承辦商、顧問公司及其他相關人士，已在全港多區運作一段時間。有關集團涉嫌透過不同手段，意圖操控投標結果。在部分目標維修工程招標期間，集團主腦會向顧問公司索取屬機密資料的工程估價，然後再協調集團內其他成員的投標安排，例如以較高價入標、即俗稱「豬仔標」，營造競爭假象，藉此掩護主腦中標。

競委會又發現，在另一些招標項目，承辦商之間會互相「陪跑」，假意競爭，以協助預定的承辦商中標。有關行為構成圍標、合謀定價及交換敏感資料，違反《競爭條例》下的「第一行為守則」。

今次行動涉及13個住宅屋苑及單幢大廈，以及4座工業及商業大廈的維修工程，分布港、九、新界共9個地區。競委會除了持法庭手令搜查處所外，亦行使其強制權力，要求有關各方交出文件和資料，以及出席競委會聆訊以提供相關資料。

競委會表示，已成功揪出了另一個圍標集團，當中大部分涉案的工程合約尚未批出，已陸續與所有涉案樓宇的相關持份者聯絡。競委會重申，就損害民生福祉的反競爭行為，定必追查到底，絕不姑息。

title: 習近平︰中英須加強對話合作　施紀賢︰樂見香港成英中獨特橋樑
news_content:
國家主席習近平在北京人民大會堂，會見來華進行正式訪問的英國首相施紀賢，雙方同意中英要發展長期穩定的全面戰略伙伴關係。

習近平指出，當前國際局勢變亂交織，中英作為聯合國安理會常任理事國和世界主要經濟體，無論是維護世界和平穩定，還是促進兩國經濟民生，都需要加強對話和合作。中方願同英方秉持大歷史觀，超越分歧、相互尊重，把中英合作「大有可為」的潛力，轉化成「大有作為」的實績，為中英關係與合作開新局，既造福兩國人民，也惠及世界。

習近平表示，中英經貿合作的本質是互利共贏，今年是中國「十五五」開局之年，雙方要拓展教育、醫療、金融、服務業互利合作，開展人工智能、生物科學、新能源和低碳技術等領域聯合研究和產業轉化，實現共同發展繁榮，希望英方為中國企業提供公平、公正、非歧視的營商環境。習近平又說，雙方要密切人文交流，進一步便利人員往來，中方願積極考慮對英實施單方面免簽。

中方引述施紀賢表示，英方在台灣問題上長期奉行的政策沒有改變，也不會改變。他又說，香港繁榮穩定符合兩國共同利益，英方樂見香港成為英中之間的獨特重要橋樑。

施紀賢又說，很高興成為8年來首位訪華的英國首相，今次他率領60多位英國重要工商、文化界代表訪華，足以展現英中合作的廣度和英方致力於深化擴大對華合作的決心。

title: 黃大仙祠年廿九晚9時起開放給市民入祠等上「頭炷香」
news_content:
嗇色園黃大仙祠公布農曆新年「頭炷香」安排，大除夕年廿九、即2月16日晚上9時起，開放給市民入祠，等候在踏入子時、即晚上11時，或午夜12時上「頭炷香」，黃大仙祠會通宵開放至年初一晚上9時。

嗇色園副主席梁宇華表示，黃大仙祠於年廿九下午4時半起，關閉作準備，至晚上9時再開放讓市民入內。市民可在黄大仙祠外的廟宇廣場及黃大仙廣場排隊。祠內將實施單向參神路線及實施人潮管制；不設求籤區、跪拜區及供品區；禁止攜帶元寶蠟燭、生油及大型香枝。

至於大年初二至正月十四，由早上7時半開放至下午6時，正月十五元宵節會開放至晚上9時。

黃大仙祠內的月老殿完成修葺並於本月初重新開放。嗇色園表示，今年西方情人節與農曆新年時間接近，2月13至14日會延長開放時間至晚上9時，並提供紅繩給市民參拜月老。3月3日元宵節，下午6時後入園可獲送贈發光小禮物，園內亦設有影相打卡位置，市民可穿著華服入園共度佳節。

嗇色園表示，去年農曆新年期間，錄得近100萬人次入園。

title: 黃仁勳冀在中國銷售H200人工智能晶片
news_content:
Nvidia行政總裁黃仁勳表示，希望中國容許公司銷售H200人工智能晶片。他稱，目前相關許可正在最終敲定中，未收到相關晶片的採購訂單。

黃仁勳又說，較早時在內地拜訪客戶、合作夥伴及政府官員。

title: 世界黃金協會：去年黃金需求創新高　投資總需求急升逾8成
news_content:
世界黃金協會公布，去年全球黃金需求增長約1%，達到5002噸，創歷史新高。

期內，交易所買賣基金(ETF)流入801噸黃金，是歷來第2多；金條及金幣需求則升16%至1374噸，創12年新高。不過，金飾需求跌18%，其中，中國購買量跌24%，創2009年以來最低水平。

去年央行增持黃金863噸，達到協會預測上限，按年則跌21%。

去年黃金投資總需求急升84%至2175噸，創新高。

協會指，考慮到地緣緊張局勢持續，估計未來1年黃金相關ETF將保持強勁資金流入，金條及金幣需求亦會十分旺盛。

title: 滬股高收約0.2%　連升3日　再創逾半個月新高
news_content:
滬深股市個別發展，白酒、貴金屬、油氣開採、房地產、金融、旅遊等股份造好，半導體、光刻機、電網設備等股份受壓。

上證指數反覆靠穩，但升幅有限，收報4157點，升6點，升幅0.16%，連升3日，再創逾半個月收市新高。

深證成份指數報14300點，跌42點，跌幅0.3%。

創業板指數報3304點，跌19點，跌幅0.57%。

title: 景林邨魚池過百條魚死亡　據了解清潔公司管工涉殘酷對待動物被捕
news_content:
將軍澳景林邨的魚池，本周一有過百條魚死亡。據了解，警方拘捕一名51歲清潔公司女管工，涉嫌殘酷對待動物。

現場是景桃樓對開公園的一個魚池，有市民將不同品種的魚類和龜等放入池中飼養。據了解，有關魚池由去年8月起，由兩間清潔公司一同管理。

本周一下午，有清潔公司的工人清潔魚池，據了解，期間工人把魚和龜移往裝有氣泵的容器。同日晚上有市民報案，指發現容器內多條魚沒有氣息及無人看管。

警員及愛護動物協會職員到場，據了解，經點算後有114條魚死亡，初步相信是因為容器內缺乏足夠氧氣。警方經調查後昨日拘捕一名51歲清潔公司的女管工。

title: 第三期簡約公屋周五起接受申請　何永賢呼籲合資格市民提交申請
news_content:
第三期簡約公屋將於星期五開始接受申請，涵蓋柴灣常安街、啟德世運道（第二期）、屯門欣寶路及屯門青發街4個項目，共約8820個單位，月租介乎900元至3020元，於下月20日前交回申請可獲優先處理。房屋局局長何永賢呼籲合資格市民把握時間提交申請，為自己及家人爭取改善生活的機會。

何永賢在社交網頁表示，在簡約公屋其他項目中，屯門青福里項目於上月底開始入伙，全部約1900個單位均已編配。項目位於輕鐵站旁邊，步行不到一分鐘已經到達，現場有便利店、自助洗衣店、仁愛堂的流動中醫車等設施，亦有不同資訊，包括學童轉校、大人就業、項目的社福服務等，幫助居民適應新生活。

何永賢形容，項目於派鎖匙當日，住戶接過鎖匙「開箱」自己的新單位時，臉上流露出的喜悅，令房屋局人員、營運機構及承建商都覺得非常暖心，感到有關工程承載著改善市民生活的重大意義。

title: 謝展寰：目標今年中批出首輪容許狗隻進入食肆申請
news_content:
環境及生態局局長謝展寰表示，施政報告提出的寵物友善措施，讓經營者可以申請容許狗隻進入食肆，目標在今年中批出首輪申請。食環署在今年上半年亦會聯同各政府部門開始採用新模式，加快審批食肆露天座位申請，助力業界開拓更多商機。

title: 'Job security worry stops workers from career change'
news_content:
A study by accounting giant PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) found only 16 percent of the city's employees intend to change jobs over the next 12 months — a more than 50 percent drop year-on-year. 

Respondents cited job security concerns as the reason for the reluctance to change employment. 

PwC revealed these findings in its fifth annual survey on the hopes and fears of workers, which was published on Thursday. 

The firm polled more than 1,050 people in Hong Kong as part of its global study involving around 50,000 respondents. 

It also found more than 40 percent of the SAR's workforce see their skills becoming irrelevant in the next three years, and over half saying they have less control over how technology affects their work. 

"If you look at the industry here in Hong Kong for the past several years, many large and medium-sized organisations have gone through transformations... the roles of the workforce are naturally changing. They had to work their existing responsibilities in some cases and also take on a new responsibility that they need to go through," said Michael Cheng, Workforce Lead Partner at the firm. 

"Because of natural transformation, it creates a sense of lack of security... that metric specifically there is a reflection of people wanting to have a little more stability and more predictability of what they are going to do, versus going through the transformations that are happening out there," he added.

The study also found workers are experiencing varying sentiments towards AI despite over 60 percent of employees using it at work. 

Around 60 percent of them expressed excitement and curiosity towards the burgeoning technology, while almost 40 percent confessed to being confused and worried about AI.

"A lot of that sentiment can be a reflection of the job market and the concern about replacement of tasks. [Gen Z] are curious and excited and optimistic about the future, given they know there will be a demand for the AI skills they possess," said Cheng.

title: Remember to change trains at Hung Hom on Sunday: MTR
news_content:
The MTR reminded Tuen Ma Line passengers that they will have to change trains when passing through Hung Hom station on Sunday, when the railway operator carries out track modification works.

Its head of Line Group Management for the Tuen Ma Line, David Chan, said on Thursday that the MTR would maintain full service for the line, and that trains will be running at normal frequencies.

"We will deploy 150 additional staff directing and assisting passengers. We would like to remind passengers to pay attention to the giant signage that staff hold on the Tuen Ma Line platforms in Hung Hom Station to identify the travelling direction of the trains on this Sunday," Chan said.

As passengers will be required to change trains to continue their journey, Chan noted that four to five minutes will be added to their travelling time.

If any unforeseen situations occur during the modification works which affect services on the following day, Chan said the MTR will announce new arrangements as soon as possible.

He reminded passengers to pay attention to any special arrangements through platforms including the MTR mobile app, MTR website, and social media.

The same arrangements will also be implemented on March 8 for track modification works for the reverse direction, Chan added.

title: HK's first-ever gold ETF jumps amid feverish demand
news_content:
Hong Kong's first-ever gold exchange traded fund (ETF) on Thursday jumped over nine percent on its trading debut, as the price of the precious metal continued to break new records, with spot gold rallying to just below US$5,600 an ounce.

The "Hang Seng Gold ETF" was launched by Hang Seng Investment, a subsidiary of Hang Seng Bank, on Thursday morning.

The fund closely tracks the morning fixing price of gold per troy ounce announced by the London Bullion Market Association (LBMA), an international trade association based in the British capital. 

It also comprises physical gold, with all gold bars stored at designated vaults located in Hong Kong. 

Speaking at the fund's listing ceremony, Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, Christopher Hui, noted there's been robust demand for gold.

He added the listing of the local gold ETF marked a milestone for the SAR, as the government is determined to transform the city into a premier gold trading hub.

"As the first ETF in Hong Kong that supports physical gold redemption at a bank, it seamlessly blends the flexibility and liquidity of an ETF with the security of physical commodities," he said.

"This enables smooth trading, secure storage, and flexible redemption  — all conducted entirely within Hong Kong," he added. 

The treasury chief also noted the government aims to speed up and establish a central clearing system for gold in Hong Kong to drive market growth, after reaching a cooperation deal with the Shanghai Gold Exchange on Monday.

Hui added the gold central clearing system would be managed by the Hong Kong Precious Metals Central Clearing Company, which is wholly owned by the government.

Echoing Hui, Luanne Lim, executive director and chief executive of Hang Seng Bank, stressed that the first-ever local gold ETF would bring greater convenience and "peace of mind" for investors.

"It's the only product that allows investors to redeem physical gold directly at a bank, and that means all storage or trading and all redemption is conducted here in Hong Kong," she said.

"And we are not stopping here, we will be launching a tokenised class for this ETF, which will be the first non-money-market tokenised ETF in Hong Kong.

"This innovation will make gold investments even more accessible and relevant to a new generation of investors," she said.

Global gold prices have been on a bull run over the past two years as investors flock to "safe haven" assets amid geopolitical and economic uncertainties, and as central banks ramp up buying.

Gold vaulted above US$5,000 an ounce for the first time on Monday and was up more ⁠than 10 percent so far this week.

title: Govt might spend more time promoting seatbelt mandate
news_content:
The Transport Department on Thursday said it might extend the promotional period for mandatory seatbelt law for public buses if that's deemed necessary, after the new legislation sparked much debate. 

The department's safety director, Stella Lee, said it understands people's concerns over things such as the difficulty to use the belts and their cleanliness.

Lee said the department has instructed bus companies to step up cleansing and checking to see how tight the belts are. 

"We understand that it takes people time to adapt to new laws. So initially we will focus mainly on promotion and public education," she said on a Commercial Radio programme.

"We will keep monitoring the implementation situation, and if we find it necessary to do this longer, then we shall do so. We think promotion and education needs to be done continuously."

When asked whether there's room for adjustments to the new legislation, Lee said everyone agrees that seatbelts are necessary and offer greater protection to passengers.

As to whether the government can change the seatbelts to ones that go around the waist only, the official said they constantly review safety devices to see if there are better and more effective ones on the market.

Lee stressed that it's necessary to mandate the wearing of seatbelts on all bus routes.

She said Hong Kong's road conditions are different to those of other places, as they go through hilly terrain and even some buses on shorter journeys would go on highways.

Back in 2018, the government formed an independent committee to review franchised bus services after a serious crash in Tai Po that led to 19 deaths and dozens of injuries.

A member of the committee, engineering scholar Lo Hong-kam, said it recommended the installation of seatbelts for existing buses after undergoing a cost and benefit analysis, but didn't conclude that the fitting should be mandatory.

He noted that the committee was of the view that once the seatbelts are available, passengers would naturally use them. 

The government subsequently allocated HK$500 million for franchised bus companies to install safety devices, including refitting seatbelts.

"I think the ultimate principle is that since the seatbelts are there, they should be used, otherwise the money invested would go to waste," Lo said on the same programme.

"If the seatbelts are installed, the people can use them, or they should use them as much as possible."

He noted that Hong Kong is unique in that there are some four million bus passenger trips a day, and even a low traffic incident rate could lead to many casualties.

title: HKMA keeps rates unchanged after Fed decision
news_content:
The Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) on Thursday kept its base rate unchanged at four percent – after a similar move by the US Federal Reserve overnight. 

Just hours earlier, the Fed announced it was keeping its target range for the federal funds rate unchanged – at between 3.5 percent and 3.75 percent – following the first Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting this year.

In a statement, the HKMA noted that the Fed's decision is in line with market expectations, but warned that the future of American monetary policy remains uncertain, depending on inflation and employment conditions.

"The future trend of US interest rates remains quite uncertain, which may influence the interest rate environment in Hong Kong," the statement said.

"The public should carefully manage interest rate risks when making decisions about property purchase, investment or borrowing," it noted.

The authority also said that the city's monetary and financial markets have continued to operate in an orderly manner, adding it will closely monitor market changes.

Under a currency peg known as the Linked Exchanged Rate System, the city's monetary policy has moved in lockstep with the Fed since 1983, with Hong Kong dollar interbank rates generally tracking their US dollar counterparts.

However, the HKMA also said that the shorter-tenor interbank rates could be affected by the supply and demand situation of the Hong Kong dollar funding in the local market.

The latest pause in rate reductions came after Hong Kong and US central bank policymakers trimmed their key interest rates by a total of 75 basis points last year – following three policy meetings since September. 

Following the latest FOMC meeting, Fed chairman, Jerome Powell had indicated in a media briefing that there was no rush to further cut rates.

Among the FOMC policymakers, while 10 voted for no change, two members – Stephan Miran and Christopher Waller – had voted for a quarter-percentage-point rate cut, signalling division within the Fed.

Markets are also closely monitoring who will replace Powell when his term ends in May. Waller is seen as a possible successor.

title: 私隱專員公署接42宗建築工友投訴　涉虛假招聘廣告誘騙個人資料
news_content:
個人資料私隱專員公署過去兩星期接獲42宗投訴個案，涉及刊登虛假招聘廣告誘騙個人資料，全部與建造業界的職位空缺有關。公署呼籲建築工友求職時提高警覺，在提供個人資料之前，核實招聘廣告及招聘者的真偽，以保障個人資料私隱。

公署表示，42宗個案的事主都是建築工友，他們從不同社交媒體平台及即時通訊軟件群組，包括WhatsApp、Facebook以及WeChat群組，留意到招聘地盤散工的訊息，對職位空缺表明興趣，並向訊息發布者提供個人資料，包括香港身份證、建造業工人註冊證及俗稱「平安卡」的相片。有個案的事主亦提供了銀行戶口號碼予訊息發布者。其後，訊息發布者指示個別工友於指定時間在某港鐵站出口集合，但最終沒有現身並失去聯絡。工友們擔心個人資料可能已被不法分子濫用或作其他非法用途，向公署作出投訴。

title: 海關破獲內河船走私案　檢巿值逾5600萬元懷疑走私物品
news_content:
海關破獲一宗內河船走私案，檢獲巿值超過5600萬元懷疑走私物品。

海關於上星期三在爛角咀對出水域截停一艘正前往澳門的內河船，檢獲大批懷疑走私貨物。海關有組織罪案調查科特別調查第一組調查主任胡雪兒表示，船上貨物當時報稱載有紅酒、護膚品和保健品等，但經點算後，發現大量未列倉單貨物，包括煙草產品、電子及藥劑產品、名牌服飾、手錶、手提電話和平板電腦等。

在檢獲的懷疑藥劑製品和美容針劑內，看到包裝上顯示標有第一部毒藥成份，海關呼籲市民切勿購買和使用來歷不明的藥劑製品和美容針劑，海關會繼續調查案件，包括貨物來源和最終目的地等，不排除會有人被捕。

她表示，留意到不法分子以魚目混珠的方式，將大量未列倉單的貨物混集在已報關的貨物內，想藉此逃避執法，重申海關會一直全方位打擊不同類型的走私活動，繼續利用情報分析和風險管理堵截任何類型的罪行。

title: 陳學鋒：「7年樓齡」機制對可持續性或有壓力　市建局內部有討論
news_content:
市建局向土瓜灣馬頭圍道/落山道發展項目的業主發出收購建議，以實用面積每平方呎14807元收購物業。市建局表示，項目內大部分樓宇的樓齡已近60年、甚至有高達70年，以及一幢戰前建築，反映以「7年樓齡」的假設重置單位呎價，與市建局收購舊樓物業樓齡的差距已愈來愈大，與舊樓物業平均市值比較，更可高達多1.28倍。相關機制所帶來的財政負擔，將不利於舊區更新的長遠可持續發展。

身兼市建局非執行董事的立法會議員陳學鋒表示，市建局一直以「7年樓齡」機制進行收購，對市民而言有關水平可能較高，能夠更換到較好的居住環境。但對市建區的長遠發展，「7年樓齡」可能會構成較大經濟負擔，對可持續性可能造成壓力。因為樓齡較大、例如50年樓齡的舊樓，其價值與「7年樓齡」有較大差距。

陳學鋒說，市建局內部對於「7年樓齡」機制有所討論，主要著眼於繼續採取有關賠償水平，能否做到可持續市區更新。他又說，近年樓市曾經出現下行情況，令市建局思考如何讓市區更新速度可持續，如果資金回籠不足甚或出現赤字，會影響推展市區重建更新。

他認為要令到市建局財務可持續，「7年樓齡」機制是較主要的檢討方向，其次是考慮收購重建項目的數目和速度等。他又說，市建局在揀選項目時，會考慮有關項目能否有盈利或收支平衡，同時會考慮能否與鄰近其他項目發揮效益。

title: 港鐵屯馬綫進行路軌改道工序　周日途經紅磡站需轉車
news_content:
港鐵屯馬綫紅磡站至尖東站之間將進行路軌改道的跟進工序，部分路段需要短暫封閉，屯馬綫本星期日將實施特別服務安排，屆時屯馬綫會繼續維持全綫列車服務正常班次，但如車程途徑紅磡站的乘客需要在該站下車，到對面月台轉車。

港鐵表示，屆時由烏溪沙站開出的列車，會以紅磡站為終點站，之後返回烏溪沙站；由屯門站開出的列車，同樣以紅磡站為終點站，之後返回屯門站。

港鐵屯馬綫，輕鐵及港鐵巴士營運主管陳志雄表示，港鐵星期日會安排人手在紅磡站屯馬綫月台舉起大型指示牌，清楚列明月台列車行駛的方向，方便乘客辨識，亦會加派超過150名職員在紅磡站及屯馬綫沿線車站協助乘客。

他又說，港鐵工程團隊已做好詳細規劃及進行演練，務求按時完成工序及檢查。若因未能預期的情況而影響到下星期一屯馬錢的列車服務，港鐵會盡快公布及通知乘客，並作出相應的車務安排，將影響減低。至於下一次的特別服務安排，將於3月8日星期日實施。

title: 工信部要求光伏行業「反內卷」亦要「防壟斷」
news_content:
內地工業和信息化部召開光伏行業企業家座談會，提到「反內卷」方法時，額外提到「防範壟斷風險」；對行業自律的提法亦由過去的「支持行業自律」、「加強行業自律」，轉變為「依法依規推進行業自律」。

工信部新聞稿強調，光伏行業協會要積極履行職能，依法依規推進行業自律，創新方式，堅決破除行業「內卷式」競爭。

市場監管總局3周前約談6家光伏企業及行業協會時亦要求，協會及企業不得約定產能、產銷量及銷售價格，確保加價與行業自律行為不觸及壟斷紅線。

news_content:

title: 春運下周一展開　國鐵集團推出網上誤購限時免費退票新措施
news_content:
內地春運下星期一展開。國鐵集團客運部主任朱文忠說，今年首次推出互聯網誤購限時免費退票新措施，旅客在12306客戶端購票時，如果因不同原因誤購車票，在支付成功的30分鐘內、以及開車前4小時以上，退票時將不收取退票費，預計將成為未來常態化措施。

朱文忠表示，春運高峰購票需求大，部分熱門線路和時段存在較大供需矛盾，鐵路部門將及時增開列車，特別是增開夜間高鐵。他又說，針對最近有第三方平台以各種「搶票神器」名目，誘導旅客加價搶票，當局聲明鐵路12306客戶端是中國鐵路唯一官方火車票網絡售票渠道，沒有與任何第三方平台合作，也沒有提供任何數據給第三方。

國家發改委副主任李春臨表示，現時流行父母到子女家過年，預計「反向春運」、「先回家、再出遊」成為今年新趨勢。鐵路部門預計在客流高峰日最高可開行超過1.4萬列旅客列車，並將增加前往樞紐機場和熱門旅遊地的航班，預計每日平均逾1.9萬班次，按年增長5%，公路方面會加強對熱門旅遊地和農村客運等運力投放。

title: 衞生署社區牙科支援計劃本月起擴大服務範圍　受惠對象擴至無家者
news_content:
衞生署社區牙科支援計劃本月起擴大服務範圍，包括增加服務及擴闊受惠對象至無家者。衞生署社區牙科服務高級牙科醫生朱永豪表示，擴大服務範圍後，市民需求熱烈，尤其洗牙等預防性服務有迫切需求，將視乎整體服務量需求，再決定如何調配資源。

朱永豪在本台節目《千禧年代》表示，目前有32間非政府組織參加計劃，全港18區有超過80個服務點，暫時可應付需求。會與非政府組織緊密合作，如果有需要會研究增添服務單位和服務點。朱永豪說，已豁免無家者提供經濟證明文件要求，交由認可非政府組織認證、申請及約期等。目前非政府組織正進行相關預備工作，包括推廣口腔健康。

聖雅各福群會高級經理歐陽妙雯在同一節目表示，正陸續接觸不同無家者服務機構，連同其無家者服務團隊，為無家者講解計劃內容，做口腔健康教育。她解釋說普遍無家者多忽略口腔護理，不太認識牙科治療。團隊希望先透過檢查和洗牙，令他們明白口腔健康狀況，再講解牙科治療安排，並提供合適治療。

歐陽妙雯認為先講解治療過程，可減少憂慮，牙科診所會安排位置給無家者存放物品，讓他們安心檢查和接受服務。在計劃下，政府會全數資助無家者的口腔檢查、洗牙、補牙或拔牙等行政費，但若無家者要鑲配活動假牙，需支付500元共付額。歐陽妙雯說，部分無家者有收入可支付費用，如有需要，團隊會協助申請資助。

title: 恒生：實物黃金ETF可便利黃金投資　證監會：樂見更多創新
news_content:
恒生投資推出實物黃金ETF。恒生銀行行政總裁林慧虹在上市儀式上致辭說，發行黃金ETF主要由於香港作為國際黃金交易中心的地位日益提升，同時恒生一直與黃金存在緊密連結，黃金在過去一年金融市場中亦扮演重要角色。

她說，今次發行的ETF是市場上唯一一隻可讓投資者直接在銀行贖回實物黃金的產品，意味著所有儲存、交易和贖回都在香港進行，為客戶提供更大便利和安心。她又指，該ETF未來將會增設代幣化類別，有望成為本港首隻非貨幣市場代幣化ETF，令未來黃金投資更為便利。

在同一場合的證監會主席黃天佑表示，證監會樂見更多創新，以擴大市場參與範圍及增強市場韌性，並運用區塊鏈等前沿工具，使本港市場為未來做好準備。當局會堅持大膽且負責任的創新，歡迎更多具價值的理念、提案和產品，有信心為投資者、市場和香港創造更多豐碩成果。

title: 市建局向馬頭圍道/落山道項目發收購建議　每平方呎14807元
news_content:
市建局向土瓜灣馬頭圍道/落山道發展項目受影響的物業業主發出收購建議。項目內受影響的合資格住宅物業自住業主，可獲市建局提出以實用面積每平方呎14807元收購物業。

市建局說，住宅物業自住業主可獲的14807元假設單位呎價，相比起其舊樓物業市值一般超出一倍，與市建局去年9月向土瓜灣明倫街/馬頭角道發展計劃的倍值相約，並高於去年2月市建局向毗鄰的靠背壟道/浙江街發展計劃收購建議的倍值。

局方又說，有關呎價是假定為同一地區7年樓齡的假設重置單位的呎價。市建局經公開抽籤方式選出7間獨立顧問公司，今年1月中進行評估，訂定該假設單位呎價，其後獲市建局董事會轄下的土地、安置及補償委員會批准。市建局會為合資格的住宅物業自住業主在現金補償以外，提供參與「樓換樓」計劃的額外選項。

項目涉及約110個業權，業主將有60日時間考慮市建局的收購建議。按照市建局現行政策，當業主接受收購建議並完成收購手續後，市建局會為有關物業內所有合資格的租客提供特惠津貼，而合資格的住宅租客更可選擇安置安排以替代特惠津貼。

市建局行政總監蔡宏興表示，項目內大部分樓宇的樓齡已近60、甚至有高達70年的樓宇及一幢戰前建築，反映以「7年樓齡」的假設重置單位呎價，與市建局收購舊樓物業樓齡的差距已愈來愈大，與舊樓物業平均市值比較，更可高達多1.28倍。相關機制所帶來的財政負擔，將不利於舊區更新的長遠可持續發展。

title: 東電指設備組合設定問題或是柏崎刈羽核電站反應堆觸發警報原因
news_content:
日本共同社引述東京電力公司消息，改變電流頻率的部件及驅動控制棒的設備組合設定，出現問題，可能是柏崎刈羽核電站6號機組反應堆，在重啟後作業過程中觸發警報的原因。

日本最大核電站柏崎刈羽核電站，由東京電力公司營運，2011年311東日本大地震後一直停運。

本月21日，電力公司重啟這座核電站的6號機組，翌日在重啟不到一日的時間，機組在控制棒拔出作業中響起警報，拔出作業停止。隨後東京電力公司表示需要調查故障原因，有關機組已暫停運作。

title: 內地春運下周一展開　發改委料跨區人員流動將達95億人次創新高
news_content:
內地春運下星期一展開，為期40日。國家發改委副主任李春臨表示，今年春節較特殊，假期前適逢周末，從下月15日起連休共9天假期，形容今年春節是大年，預計返鄉探親旅遊需求將更旺盛，研判社會跨區人員流動將達95億人次，創歷史新高。其中自駕出行將繼續成為主體，達8成左右，鐵路和民航客運量預計分別將達5億4000萬人次和9500萬人次，總體規模和單日峰值，有望超過歷史同期。

李春臨指出，相關部門將提高客流需求研判，加大重點地區熱門線路高峰時段的運力供給，統籌做好重要物資運輸工作；會強化春運安全，深入開展重大風險隱患排查整治；優化購票、安檢和換乘服務，提升出行體驗；強化交通樞紐能源和網絡通信保障。

李春臨提到，春運是一個非常複雜的綜合系統性工程，也是承載億萬人民群眾回家團圓的期盼，將與相關部門做好春運工作，保障群眾平安回家過年。

title: 陳正犖：聯儲局仍有減息需要　卓亮：若通脹回落減息周期或延長
news_content:
美國聯儲局一如預期維持利率不變。渣打香港財富方案投資策略主管陳正犖形容，議息結果沒有太大驚喜，亦無太大驚嚇，當局對通脹及就業看法均屬預期內，因此市場反應不大。

陳正犖說，利率期貨顯示，市場預期最快6月才再減息，仍預期今年有0.5厘減息空間。他認為，減息0.5厘至0.75厘合理，由於上季就業市場收縮，是2020年以來首次，職位空缺少於失業人口，亦處於近年來較弱狀態，聯儲局仍有減息需要。

他指，目前聯儲局潛在主席人選多傾向減息，但他認為減息幅度仍有變數，又指如果下任主席基於政治因素多於經濟因素去判斷利率，或令市場震盪加劇。即使政策利率下跌，亦不代表債息等市場利率一定回落，因為市場或對美國資產有戒心。

東亞銀行首席經濟師卓亮表示，聯儲局認為美國經濟好轉，就業市場壓力減少，通脹預期相對平穩，反映短期內不急於調整利率政策，預料鮑威爾任期內仍會維持利率不變，直至換人後在下半年重新減息。他又認為，若通脹仍然回落，減息周期可能延長至明年。

卓亮提到，即使美國重啟減息，香港最優惠利率再度調整機會較低，因為已處於今輪周期底部，但拆息仍有下跌空間，今年私人住宅樓價或有高單位數升幅。

他說，實物黃金ETF具有ETF的靈活和流動性，以及實體商品的安全性，對本港金融持續創新感到鼓舞，期望未來探索透過持牌虛擬資產交易所進行分銷，有助於連接傳統和虛擬金融，釋放新機會。

title: Two men charged with smuggling HK$6.1m of silver
news_content:
Two men charged with smuggling HK$6.1 million worth of suspected silver to the mainland will appear in court on Thursday morning.

The pair, aged 40 and 46, were arrested at the Heung Yuen Wai Boundary Control Point on Tuesday, as they tried to make their way to Shenzhen in a private car.

During Customs clearance, officers located three undeclared paper boxes in the boot. One of the men claimed the goods were milk formula and festive food items, and presented corresponding receipts.

But inspector Mok Ka-fai said X-ray scans revealed something else.

"During the inspection, we found that the three paper boxes were surprisingly heavy - each of them weighing over 7kg on average," he said.

"This raised our suspicions so we did an X-ray scan right away... Some images purported to show high-density items resembling metal, instead of food."

Officers seized about 219kg of silver concealed inside tin cans, mingled with other foodstuffs such as milk formula, cookies and egg rolls.

Senior investigator Li Tsz-wing said the duo could have evaded duty of about HK$800,000 had they successfully smuggled the dutiable goods across the border.

They were charged with one count of attempting to export unmanifested cargo, and were due to appear at Fanling Magistrates' Courts on Thursday.

Li believed soaring prices have incentivised criminals to smuggle precious metals out of Hong Kong for profit, adding more officers have been deployed at checkpoints as Lunar New Year approaches.

title: 李艷芳：料市民認同戴安全帶可保障安全　當局會持續檢視實施情況

對於一輛九巴有座位安全帶懷疑被毀壞，李艷芳說，市民在公共交通工具上要守法，不可以破壞設施。

title: Tesla profits tumble on lower EV sales, AI spending
news_content:
Tesla reported a 61-percent drop in fourth-quarter profits on Wednesday due to lower auto sales and increased expenses as CEO Elon Musk ramps up technology investments.

The results conclude a turbulent year for the electric vehicle maker that included a controversial Musk stint in Donald Trump's White House and a shareholder vote in November to award the outspoken CEO a pay package worth as much as US$1 trillion in anticipation of massive technology breakthroughs at Tesla.

Profits came in at US$840 million in the quarter ending December 31, down from US$2.1 billion a year earlier.

Revenues were US$24.9 billion, down 3.1 percent.

Lower profits had been expected after Tesla reported a drop in fourth-quarter and full-year auto deliveries early in January.

A company presentation cited a litany of other factors. These included higher restructuring costs, increased research and development funding for AI pursuits, the drag from higher tariffs and a decline in revenues tied to emission tax credits following Trump's reversals on US environmental policies.

Musk opened a conference call by saying he was committed to "very, very big investments" to realize the mission of working to ensure "the best future," an "era of abundance" where the "environment is great, nature is great, and people can have whatever they want."

Chief Financial officer Vaibhav Taneja said the 2026 capital spending budget would be "in excess of US$20 billion," more than that double the US$8.5 billion last year.

Musk said Tesla plans to wind down production of the Models S and X luxury EVs and will convert plant capacity in Fremont, California to build humanoid robots.

Tesla's outlook did not include a projection for its expected 2026 auto sales, saying it would depend partly on "aggregate demand for our products."

In its January 2025 earnings release, Tesla projected a return to growth in vehicle sales. But Tesla's 2025 auto sales fell nine percent, reflecting increased competition from rivals and blowback to Musk's embrace of Trump and far-right political figures.

Shares of Tesla rose sharply in the second half of 2025 after Musk left the White House in spite of weaker financial results shrugged off due to Tesla's perceived growth potential.

Musk has touted Tesla's technological prowess on artificial intelligence and autonomous driving as a decisive advantage against rivals that justifies the company's lofty stock market valuation. The company describes itself as in "transition from a hardware-centric business to a physical AI company."

At the World Economic Forum earlier this month, Musk described self-driving cars as "essentially a solved problem at this point," adding that the robotaxi service will be very widespread in the United States by the end of 2026.

Musk has also spoken optimistically about the expected growth in revenue tied to subscriptions of the driver-assistance "FSD" program.

Many analysts have learned to take Musk's utterances with a grain of salt after earlier predictions about the nearness of fully autonomous driving didn't come to pass.

CFRA Research analyst Garrett Nelson characterised Wednesday's results as better than expected, pointing to revenue gains from Tesla's energy generation and storage business and the company's confirmation of the buildout of Cybercab and other big projects targeted for 2026.

Stil, "execution risk is high as Tesla has its work cut out to deliver on its promises and justify the company's lofty valuation in the face of challenging EV demand and growing competitive threats," Nelson said.

Included in Wednesday's earnings press release, Tesla disclosed that it entered into an agreement on January 16 to invest US$2 billion in Musk's xAI artificial intelligence venture.

A "framework" accord "builds upon the existing relationship between Tesla and xAI by providing a framework for evaluating potential AI collaborations between the companies," said Tesla, adding that the investment agreement is expected to close in the first quarter.

Tesla shares rose 1.7 percent in after-hours trading. (AFP)

title: Microsoft shares slide as AI spending surges
news_content:
Microsoft on Wednesday reported a 60 percent jump in net income for the last quarter of 2025, but spending on artificial intelligence surged, rattling investors.

Shares in the cloud and software giant sank more than six percent in after-hours trading, with investors keeping a close eye on capital expenditures as the company spends heavily in the AI race against rivals Google, Amazon and Meta.

The company said that capital expenditures, which largely consist of the massive build-out for AI and cloud infrastructure, grew by 66 percent to US$37.5 billion.

Investors are also looking at Microsoft's ties to OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT.

Microsoft now holds a 27 percent stake in OpenAI, which has quickly grown to become the world's most valuable private company with a US$500 billion valuation, but which some feel is overspending.

Analysts expressed worry that a sizeable chunk of Microsoft's expected revenue over the coming quarters was from a financially overstretched OpenAI.

Microsoft said about 45 percent of its remaining cloud commitments are from OpenAI.

OpenAI is the leader in generative AI technology, but is required to raise billions every year to meet its huge expenses for computing and top engineering talent.

Beating expectations, Microsoft posted net income of US$38.5 billion on revenue of US$81.3 billion for the three months ending December 31.

This was up from US$24.1 billion in profit on US$69.6 billion in revenue a year earlier.

Analysts said that the net income figure was boosted by gains booked from Microsoft's investment in OpenAI.

Azure and other cloud services, Microsoft's most closely watched segment, saw revenue surge 39 percent, roughly in line with expectations.

The company said demand for cloud services continues to exceed available supply.

With this earnings result, "Microsoft didn't declare victory on AI-but it made a credible case that the spending has a path to payback," said Emarketer principal analyst Jeremy Goldman.

title: Wall Street muted as Fed pauses interest rate cuts
news_content:
The Nasdaq rose slightly with a boost from chip stocks while the S&P 500 closed virtually unchanged on Wednesday as investor reactions were muted after the US Federal Reserve kept interest rates unchanged as expected and gave little indication when borrowing costs might fall again.

In its statement, the Fed cited still-elevated inflation alongside solid economic growth for its decision. The US central bank said the job market has "shown some signs of stabilisation" and removed language from its prior statement saying that downside risks to employment had risen.

Investors had widely expected the central bank to keep rates unchanged at 3.5 percent - 3.75 percent and it said that eight out of 10 policymakers had voted to hold rates steady. After the statement, traders boosted their bets that the Fed would cut short-term borrowing costs in June – but not before then.

And in his closely monitored press conference, Fed Chair Jerome Powell was careful not to comment on future rate decisions, saying that ⁠the Fed would be data-dependent, but he told reporters that the upside risks to inflation and downside risks to employment have diminished.

"Whether you were bullish or bearish going into the press conference you walked away feeling about the same," said Michael James, equity sales trader at Rosenblatt Securities.

"Employment and inflation risks have downsized, but inflation overall remains stubborn. There hasn't been a meaningful enough change in the employment market to warrant the Fed doing something. 

There hasn't been a meaningful enough improvement in inflation to allow the Fed to be more aggressive with further cuts," James added.

The S&P 500 edged down 0.1 percent, to 6,978, the Dow was barely moved at 49,015, while the Nasdaq rose 0.2 percent, to 23,857. (Reuters)

title: US Fed leaves rates unchanged amid 'solid economy'
news_content:
The US Federal Reserve held interest rates steady on Wednesday amid what US central bank chief Jerome Powell described as a solid economy and diminished risks to both inflation and employment – an outlook that could signal a lengthy wait before any further reductions in borrowing costs.

"The economy has once again surprised us with its strength," Powell said at a press conference after Fed policymakers voted 10-2 to hold the central bank's benchmark interest rate in the 3.50-3.75 percent range following a two-day meeting.

Noting broad internal support for the decision, Powell said the Fed remains "well-positioned" to assess when or whether another rate cut may be needed.

"There could be combinations, infinite numbers of combinations that would cause us to want to move," he said, with labour market weakening or inflation heading back down to the Fed's 2 percent goal as two of those possibilities.

Since the Fed's last policy meeting in December, when it delivered a third straight rate cut, "the upside risks to inflation and the downside risks to employment have diminished. But they still exist," Powell said.

"We think our policy is in a good place."

Both Governor Christopher Waller, a contender to replace Powell when his term as central bank chief ends in May, and Governor ⁠Stephen Miran, on leave from his job as an economic adviser at the White House, dissented in favour of a quarter-percentage-point rate cut.

The actual rate decision, which was widely expected by financial markets, was overshadowed during the post-meeting press conference as reporters questioned Powell about threats to Fed independence and whether he intended to stay on at the central bank after his term as central bank chief ends in May, a possibility given new life after the Trump administration opened a criminal investigation into him earlier this month.

US President Donald Trump has excoriated the Fed and Powell for failing to deliver the large rate cuts the president believes are needed to stimulate the economy.

Powell said at the time that the probe was aimed at pressuring the central bank to cut rates in line with the president's preferences.

The Fed chief on Wednesday declined to comment further on the matter. But he did have some advice for his successor: "Don't get pulled into elected politics," Powell said, adding that the next Fed chief also should work hard at being accountable to Congress, which oversees the central bank.

The statement from the policy-setting Federal Open Market Committee offered no hint about when another rate cut might come, noting that "the extent and timing of additional adjustments" to the policy rate would depend on incoming data and the economic outlook, phrasing that Powell also used in his remarks.

"We expect the Federal Reserve to remain on an extended pause. Interest rates are close to neutral and labour market conditions are stabilising," Michael Pearce, chief US economist at Oxford Economics, wrote after the policy decision, anticipating that an eventual decline in inflation, still running about 1 percentage point above the Fed's target, would lead to rate cuts in June and September.

That outlook would likely push the next rate decision to Powell's successor, ⁠who is expected to be nominated by Trump soon and confirmed by the Senate in time to lead the June 16-17 meeting.

Though the Fed noted on Wednesday that "job gains have remained low," policymakers also removed language from their prior statement saying that downside risks to employment had risen – an indication they as a group are becoming less worried about a rapid downturn.

Fed officials ahead of this week's meeting had largely characterised the job market as roughly in balance, with the smaller job gains matching the slower growth in the numbers of those seeking employment as a result of the Trump administration's stricter immigration policies. (Reuters)

title: 鮑威爾：利率決定受廣泛支持　通脹上行及就業下行風險較之前降低
news_content:
美國聯儲局公布，維持聯邦基金利率目標區間於3.5至3.75厘不變，符合市場預期。聯儲局官員以10比2投票結果，決定利率按兵不動，投反對票的理事沃勒和米蘭傾向減息0.25厘。

主席鮑威爾在議息會議後面見傳媒時表示，今次的利率決定得到廣泛支持，包括未有投票權的委員。他表示，當局已完成大部分政策正常化的過程，強調目前貨幣政策正處於有利位置，可以根據每次會議的情況，結合不斷更新的數據、不斷變化的經濟前景等作出利率決定。

他提到，通脹上行及就業下行風險較之前降低，但難以判斷相關風險是否完全處於平衡，委員會內部對如何作出平衡有不同觀點，當局會繼續關注情況發展。

鮑威爾又指，關稅可能帶來一次性的價格上升，通脹超出預期的大部分都是來自關稅，而非需求，相信關稅大部分影響已傳導至經濟，預計關稅通脹將在今年年中消退，如果這種情況出現，反映當局可以放鬆政策。

在鮑威爾主席任期完結前，聯儲局仍有兩次貨幣政策會議。他未有回應之後會否繼續在聯儲局留任，及會否與新主席共事的問題，但強調聯儲局致力維持獨立性。他建議下一任主席要遠離政治，亦要努力向國會爭取以獲得民主的正當性。

另外，他又提到，不少地緣政局風險集中於能源和石油領域，但目前未見太大影響。他又指，短期可能見到因人工智能賦能，而出現職位被取代，但整體影響未明。

title: 訪華的施紀賢預計今日分別與習近平及李強會晤

title: 伊朗外長稱武裝力量高度戒備　始終歡迎達成公平正義的核協議

title: 王毅：中國與阿塞拜疆應攜手踐行真正的多邊主義
news_content:
中共中央政治局委員、外長王毅在北京與阿塞拜疆外長巴伊拉莫夫會談。

王毅表示，中阿同為全球南方國家，應攜手踐行真正的多邊主義，維護以聯合國為核心的國際體系，倡導平等有序的世界多極化、普惠包容的經濟全球化，推動構建更公正合理的全球治理體系。無論國際形勢如何變化，中方都會從戰略高度看待和發展中阿關係，願與阿方深化互利合作，加強國際協作。

中方引述巴伊拉莫夫表示，願與中方密切高層交往，加強黨際交流，拓展經貿投資、互聯互通、科技教育及旅遊等領域交流合作，深化在亞信、上合組織等多邊框架內協調配合。

title: 馬克龍：格陵蘭局勢為歐洲敲響戰略警鐘　警示歐洲維護主權
news_content:
法國總統馬克龍表示，格陵蘭局勢為整個歐洲敲響戰略警鐘，警示歐洲維護主權，為北極安全作出貢獻。

馬克龍與到訪的丹麥首相弗雷澤里克森和格陵蘭自治政府總理尼爾森會談，重申對丹麥及格陵蘭主權和領土完整的支持。

他說，應丹麥要求，法國等歐洲國家已開始在北極耐力多國軍事演習框架內行動，法國支持北約建立強化警戒機制，加強在北極地區的存在。

弗雷澤里克森說，事實證明如果歐洲在面對外部壓力時，清晰而堅定地發聲，就能攜手前進，北約應該在格陵蘭及周邊的北極地區，發揮更重要作用。

title: 特朗普要求伊朗達成協議　伊外長稱施壓或以武力達成目標不可接受
news_content:
美國總統特朗普再次向伊朗施壓，指一支龐大的艦隊正前往伊朗，已經準備好迅速履行使命，希望伊朗能夠迅速坐到談判桌前，強調伊朗不能擁有核武。

特朗普要求伊朗達成協議，又說正是因為德黑蘭方面之前未達成協議，美國去年發動對伊朗的打擊行動。他威脅，下一次打擊將會更猛烈。

伊朗外長阿拉格齊表示，近日未有與美國總統特使威特科夫接觸，伊方亦未提出任何談判請求。阿拉格齊強調，如果美方希望談判真正展開，必須停止威脅、放棄過度要求，試圖透過施壓或使用武力達成目標，既不可接受，亦不能稱之為外交。

副外長加里巴巴迪說，伊朗的首要任務是做好200%的自衛準備，如果美國進行未有預設結果的談判，伊朗當然會認真考慮。
